verbose_text: However, cotreatment with inhibitors of AMPK or TLR4 blocked the beneficial effect of BP121, suggesting that BP121 mediated barrier modulation is dependent on AMPK and TLR4 signaling (XREF_FIG).
evidence: AMPK or TLR4 blocked the beneficial effect of BP121, suggesting that BP121 mediated barrier modulation is dependent on AMPK and TLR4
